attributes.review: This app is horrible. Doesn’t even work it keeps glitching keeps showing ads. It’s says that’s if you download it a unicorn will come to ur house but that didn’t happened so don’t even waste ur time and don’t get this app.
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: Terrible glitches and graphics..made me consider seeing my therapist. Misguided information.. awful news sources. Deleted app almost as soon as I downloaded it. smh wish there was a rating lower than 1 star 😓✊🏽
attributes.title: Blowed my load

attributes.review: WAYYY too many notifications. Bad aesthetic, very hard to look at for even short periods of time. Downloaded it and almost immediately deleted it! Would not recommend to anyone.
attributes.title: If I could rate it 0 stars, I would...

attributes.review: I thought this app would teach me how to be more like Donald Trump, but it DID NOT. No where was it mentioned how to file for bankruptcy, commit multiple crimes, OR where the best golden showers are located at. WAIST OF MY TIME. Also, my cat started eating my fishes after I downloaded and I’m positive there’s a coronation.
